ygData.subject: Re: players getting charmed
ygData.msgSnippet: The NPC Necro in Toxx forest does too.... ... From: King, Darrin  To:  Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 2:45 PM
ygData.messageBody:
The NPC Necro in Toxx forest does too....

----- Original Message -----
From: King, Darrin <dking@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 2:45 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: players getting charmed


> From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
> *Yes, if you are charmed you can Wail other players and kill them, your
> *turned into a NPC basically, Except players dont really regard
> *you as huch
> *of a treat =) UNTIL your hitting them, i've seen a guy
>
> Isn't that a kick? You are running along doing your thing then boom, your
> char is out of your control and all you can do is watch the screen in
> fascination ....
>
> I heard the hag in Unrest loves to charm people, and I know from firsthand
> experience that Meldrath the Malevolent, the master of the mighty minotaur
> mines, loves to charm as well.
>
